fields.Chapter Title: Instructional Leadership and English Language Teaching Through Problem-Based Learning
fields.Book Title: Leadership and Management in English Language Teaching
fields.Publisher: Leadership and Management in English Language Teaching
fields.Description/Abstract: Change is and will be an ongoing factor linking leadership, teacher education and a wide range of intellectual disciplines. English language teaching provides an overarching opportunity to impact success and serve as a catalyst for the expansion of ideas, technology and innovative accomplishments in the Gulf. As all eyes are on the Gulf and its connection to every country on earth, strong leadership in English language teaching leading to quality educational experiences designed to meet the unique needs of all learners is particularly valuable. Embracing English language learning, new technologies, and initiating change through proactive leadership will lead to relevant and purposeful accomplishments.
